name: Pthreads for Embedded Systems
short_description: A pthreads library for embedded operating systems. Implements the pthreads API using only commonly available OS primitives (e.g. semaphores, tasks) so that the library can easily be ported to almost any RTOS. Currently includes support for DSP/BIOS and P
